name: IT201_Project04_Thomas_Semiz
description: A painting tool that creates 3D spheres, cubes, or cylinders where the user clicks on the screen. Based on user input, the 3D objects can be spawned to a set a custom size or randomly generated size, there can also be a custom color or randomly generated color, there can also be a randomly generated object rotation. There is also an option to animate paint strokes. The user has the option to manually erase or auto erase or clear the screen completely.
